column4: Hi! I created a USB boot with UNetbootin utility but unable to boot from that device
Hi! I created a USB boot with UNetbootin utility but unable to boot from that USB device
BIOS limitation or bad image creation.
: I went into the BIOS setup and changed it to boot from USB
Then unetbootin didnt make the image correctly or the drive might not have been properly unmounted first?
: What do I do to verify the installation ?
If it dont boot it aint no good. Thats how you check it.
: so you ask me to reinstall and then try ?
md5sum the ISO and then reformat the drive to fat32 and try again.
:  I will do that Pl. tell me how to remove this grub entry When ever I install there is an entry made into Grub
Grub where? On the unetbootin device?
You can edit it sure as long as you know what your doing. Google has step by step guides for you.
: tell me where I need to change in order to add new IRC channels?
